name: TimeQuest (itch)
description:
TimeQuest is a 2D platformer about a mercenary travelling to a distant time and his quest to get an ancient weapon.

How To Play

  • Movement: A/D or Arrow Keys
  • Jump: W or Up-arrow

This game was developed in a week and serves as AC2 (rating) for our 2D Game Structure on our first semester of Game Development university (Centro Universitário Facens/Brazil).

Our second project overall, first using our own code. All art and sound assets are available for free in itch.io and freesound.org. All the creators are credited in-game.

Credits

TETRA A Games

  • Thiago Fontoura - Art & Animation Manager, Level Designer
  • Vinicius Gomes - Sound & Music Manager, Writer
  • Pedro Aurélio - UI & Game Programmer, Level Designer

Teacher: Fabio Colombini
